title: Molecularly engineered multifunctional imide derivatives for practical Zn metal full cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02867H, Paper
Shengyang Huang, Peng Zhang, Jun Lu, Jun Su Kim, Dong Hyun Min, Jin Suk Byun, Min Ju Kim, Hao Fu, Peixun Xiong, Pil J. Yoo, Wenwu Li, Xu Yu, Xue Qin, Ho Seok Park
The molecularly engineered multifunctional additive of H-SU, which effectively modulates both solvated and interfacial structures, was chosen from a family of imide derivatives for practical aqueous Zn metal full cells.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
